name: jSocial
author: ressannedba

sections.description:
JSocial free edition is a light-weight WordPress plugin that adds a floating bar to your site to get you maximum shares.

  • Responsive, Customizable and Extensible
  • WordPress Optimized
  • Easy to understand and to read
  • A Quality Set of Buttons
  • Each social provider can be enabled or disabled (Selective disable)
  • Sharing with Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Delicious, Pinterest, Stumbleupon and Linkedin *Only in Premium Version
  • Super lightweight social sharing
  • Easy to use and integrate
  • Massive Exposure
  • Make it Easier for your Users to Share your Content
  • Custom Placement
  • And much more!

Get Premium Version
sections.installation: • Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

short_description: Light-weight WordPress plugin that adds a responsive floating bar to your site to get you maximum shares.
